_sText: UPDATE: Add optimized nav file, powered by Chizbone . This is a cs_rio remake for Source. Author's notes: I got some feed back from a few people and noticed a few problems myself. So here is the changes to v2. -fixed radar image repeating -fixed getting stuck on ground near t spawn -fixed music not turing off when radios are destroyed -fixed wall near ct spawn to provide more cover for cts from soccer field -fixed "Navigation mesh build from older version" being displayed -greatly reduced file size the .bsp is now only 18.5MB, down from 26MB NOTE: Shadowfax isn't the real author name, I see this nickname at this forum: underworldgaming.com/cgi-bin/forums/ikonboard.cgi?act=ST;f=1;t=7949
